name: The Purge (32BitsAndPieces)
description:
The Purge

The streets need cleansing of those unworthy. Pick a team of your most trusted allies and prove yourself in combat, may the better live. But beware, danger lies in the shadows. Only the best coordinated and skilled will see the light of day.

The Purge features 3vs3 multiplayer arena style combat. Each player can pick any of three unique Heroes and fend for their life. Make use of all your abilities and the environment to come out on top.

Credits

Phil Hagen Jungschlaeger - Programmer | Sound Design

Sebastian Heckner - 3D Artist | Environment Design

Lucas Hübner - Programming | Visual Design

Juro Carl Anton Reinhardt - Music | Sound Design
